segments.text: Here we are on the train .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we are travelling at rush hours . It could be very crowded in the morning and after 6 o'clock in the afternoon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hear many people have cars .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , almost all the families have their own cars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why don't they drive ? Isn't a car more convenient than the subway ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it is hard to find a parking place in the city . Besides , parking is quite expensive in the downtown .
segments.speaker: S2
